div.p: Deprecation Comment: Deprecated as per 11/2008 Harmonization cleanup; internal and obsolete HL7 usage, no longer used. This is outside the hierarchy and there's already an equivalent domain MaterialEntityClass in the right hierarchy. The corresponding code system is empty.
